android.support.v7.widget

Class SpanSizeLookup

  • java.lang.Object
    • GridLayoutManager.SpanSizeLookup
      • android.support.v7.widget.SpanSizeLookup

  • public class SpanSizeLookup
extends GridLayoutManager.SpanSizeLookup
    Wrapper class around GridLayoutManager.SpanSizeLookup. This exposes an package-private method as public method used inside the library. Also it adds caching for GridLayoutManager.SpanSizeLookup#getSpanGroupIndex(int, int) method. This method os called often by the library hence the caching.

      • getSpanGroupIndex

        public int getSpanGroupIndex(int adapterPosition,
                             int spanCount)
        Returns the index of the group this position belongs.

        For example, if grid has 3 columns and each item occupies 1 span, span group index for item 1 will be 0, item 5 will be 1.

        Parameters:
        adapterPosition - The position in adapter
        spanCount - The total number of spans in the grid
        Returns:
        The index of the span group including the item at the given adapter position
